title: #212 - Bella Thorne, Elon Musk, Adele, Ian PowerPoint
description:
On this episode of the H3 Podcast we at last bring you the long awaited return of Ian's PowerPoints! We also follow up on last weeks story about Bella Throne's OnlyFans kerfufle, Adele's bantu knots, Elon Musk's brain chip... and we introduce the newest cast member of the show...
   Bella Thorne apologizes for ‘hurting’ OnlyFans sex workers
